:: Vamprah ::

Vamprah was so weak to moved and her internal damage didn't =
let anything to defend herself, she belived that the weakness was a sight o=
f her death (but truly was the begin of deep stasis lock); her reparations =
circuits had been working all the time, and if the energy-necklance wouldn'=
t have turned on, Vamprah had left the stasis lock soon. Now her internal c=
ircuits was damaged, made her to fell and wake up of stasis lock.

Her warr=
ior's insitcs said to her that a weapon was near, her neck tensed and she m=
oved her head in oposite side of Devilduel's; she was expecting the fatat h=
it. If she would have full operational, she had fought until her death.

He=
r Pride would have forbiden to beg mercy, and like her damaged circuits mak=
e her belived that Darkfate had the knife, she liked to show him that she c=
ould death with dignity.

Her tired body couldn't resist more and her confu=
se mind didn't let her know what's going there... In the same moment that D=
evilduel lead the knife towards the necklance, Vamprah was fighting against=
 fell definity in stasis lock again and understand what was happening there=
...

  Diamond:
  She watched intently on what was going on. "CAn you c=
ut the strap 
  around the side of the neck? Or can you just cut it down th=
e middle?"

  She knew that if he got shocked, the electrical current would=
 pass 
  trhough Devilduer and into her.  He wouldn't get shocked, but she =

  would.

er::

arts

 brings Diamond's knife

nd wondering why Diamond had her
